backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and image edit metadata with authorization checks for viewing and saving.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file linking implemented frontend/backend files to product features and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of all major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling image upload, editor tools, authentication, and UI panels.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog shown after login prompting new users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/editor/components/EditorCan: Renders a canvas and applies image processing to the original image based on current settings.
frontend/src/editor/components/EditSessi: Provides UI to save current editor settings with a name and load recent saved sessions from backend.
frontend/src/editor/components/ExportPan: Allows selecting export format and JPEG quality and triggers exporting the edited image.
frontend/src/editor/components/Processin: Displays a fullâ€‘screen processing overlay with a spinner and status text.
frontend/src/editor/components/tools/Adj: Offers sliders for brightness, contrast, and saturation adjustments with change callbacks.
frontend/src/editor/components/tools/Cro: Handles selecting aspect ratios and applying or clearing a crop rectangle for the image.
frontend/src/editor/components/tools/Tra: Provides buttons to rotate or flip the image horizontally or vertically.
frontend/src/editor/copy/uiText.ts: Contains all UI text strings for the editor, organized by feature.
frontend/src/editor/hooks/useEditorState: Manages editor settings state with update, reset, and apply helpers.
frontend/src/editor/hooks/useProcessingI: Tracks whether image processing is active with start/stop controls.
frontend/src/editor/hooks/useUndoRedo.ts: Implements undo/redo history for editor settings with a capped history buffer.
frontend/src/editor/processing/canvasPip: Processes an image on a canvas by applying crop, rotation, flip, and pixel-level adjustments like brightness, contrast, and saturation.
frontend/src/editor/types.ts: Defines the EditorSettings interface and default values for image editing parameters such as brightness, rotation, flips, and crop.
frontend/src/editor/utils/exportImage.ts: Applies image processing to a temporary canvas and exports the result as a downloadable PNG or JPEG blob.
frontend/src/editor/utils/fileValidation: Validates uploaded image files by checking MIME type and enforcing a 50MB size limit.
frontend/src/editor/utils/serializeSetti: Provides JSON-based serialization and deserialization for EditorSettings with defaults applied.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables using OKLCH color values.
frontend/src/integrations/backend/hooks/: Hooks for fetching recent edit metadata and saving new image edit metadata through the backend actor.
Hooks for retrieving and updating the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, feature definitions, and image requirements for a browser-based photo editor. Includes existing features, versioning, and partial new feature requests.
